VerifiablePresentation.description: Represents a signed Verifiable Presentation (includes proof), using a JSON representation. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations | VP data model }

ProofType.description: A proof property of a  {@link  VerifiableCredential }  or  {@link  VerifiablePresentation }

W3CVerifiableCredential.description:
Represents a signed Verifiable Credential (includes proof), in either JSON or compact JWT format. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials | VC data model } 
See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#proof-formats | proof formats }

VerifiableCredential.description: Represents a signed Verifiable Credential payload (includes proof), using a JSON representation. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials | VC data model }

CredentialSubject.description:
The value of the credentialSubject property is defined as a set of objects that contain one or more properties that are each related to a subject of the verifiable credential. Each object MAY contain an id.

See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credential-subject | Credential Subject }

ContextType.description: The data type for `@context` properties of credentials, presentations, etc.

CredentialStatusReference.description:
Used for the discovery of information about the current status of a verifiable credential, such as whether it is suspended or revoked. The precise contents of the credential status information is determined by the specific `credentialStatus` type definition, and varies depending on factors such as whether it is simple to implement or if it is privacy-enhancing.

See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#status | Credential Status }

CompactJWT.description: Represents a Json Web Token in compact form. "header.payload.signature"

ICreateSelectiveDisclosureRequestArgs.description: Contains the parameters of a Selective Disclosure Request.

replyUrl.description: The URL where the response should be sent back

claims.description: A list of claims that are being requested

credentials.description: A list of issuer credentials that the target will use to establish trust

ISelectiveDisclosureRequest.description: Represents the Selective Disclosure request parameters.

essential.description: If it is essential. A response that does not include this credential is not sufficient.

credentialType.description: The credential type. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#types | W3C Credential Types }

credentialContext.description: The credential context. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#contexts | W3C Credential Context }

claimType.description: The name of the claim property that the credential should express.

claimValue.description: The value of the claim that the credential should express.

issuers.description: A list of accepted Issuers for this credential.

ICredentialRequestInput.description: Describes a particular credential that is being requested

did.description: The DID of the issuer of a requested credential.

url.description: A URL where a credential of that type can be obtained.

Issuer.description: Used for requesting Credentials using Selective Disclosure. Represents an accepted issuer of a credential.

replyUrl.description: The URL where the response should be sent back

claims.description: A list of claims that are being requested

credentials.description: A list of issuer credentials that the target will use to establish trust

sdr.description: The Selective Disclosure Request (issuer is omitted)

IGetVerifiableCredentialsForSdrArgs.description: Encapsulates the params needed to gather credentials to fulfill a Selective disclosure request.

essential.description: If it is essential. A response that does not include this credential is not sufficient.

credentialType.description: The credential type. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#types | W3C Credential Types }

credentialContext.description: The credential context. See  {@link  https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#contexts | W3C Credential Context }

claimType.description: The name of the claim property that the credential should express.

claimValue.description: The value of the claim that the credential should express.

issuers.description: A list of accepted Issuers for this credential.

ICredentialsForSdr.description: The credentials that make up a response of a Selective Disclosure

IValidatePresentationAgainstSdrArgs.description: A tuple used to verify a Selective Disclosure Response. Encapsulates the response(`presentation`) and the corresponding request (`sdr`) that made it.

IPresentationValidationResult.description: The result of a selective disclosure response validation.
